prompts.prompt: Create a high-contrast ecommerce thumbnail (1:1) featuring ONLY a Samba OG style low-top sneaker with faux cowhide print upper (off-white base with dark brown/black cow spots), gum sole, and visible pink synthetic leather lining/insole accents. Composition: bold split background—left side matte black, right side warm off-white—creating a black/white styling cue. Place the pair centered with a slight diagonal tilt; front shoe large and sharp, rear shoe slightly behind. Add a subtle pink rim light on the inner collar to highlight the pink lining. Lighting: premium studio, crisp reflections, realistic shadow on a faint floor plane. Reserve top-center space for headline and bottom area for two badges. No people, no faces, no logos, no watermark.

style.badge: rounded sticker, solid color, high contrast
rounded sticker, slightly smaller than 'Envío gratis', high contrast

composition_rules.focus: Center the shoes as the hero; ensure cow print texture and gum sole are clearly visible; keep split background flat and non-distracting; product occupies ~70% of frame.
composition_rules.text_legibility: Use solid banners/badges; avoid overlapping text with the shoes; keep headline on clean background area; ensure badges do not touch edges and remain within 10% safe margin.

prompts.negative_prompt: any brand logo, adidas text, trefoil, watermark, copyrighted graphics, recognizable faces, models, hands, lifestyle scene, clutter, additional footwear, incorrect pattern (leopard/zebra), incorrect lining color (not pink), non-gum sole, excessive motion blur, noisy background, illegible text, spelling errors, compression artifacts

input_assets.background_assets: Minimal studio background with subtle outfit icons.
input_assets.props: Three minimal line icons (jeans, skirt, dress) as generic outlines only, no logos.

prompts.prompt: Create a 1080x1080 high-conversion thumbnail. Feature ONLY the described Samba OG–style cow print sneakers: off-white upper with dark brown/black cow patches, three white side stripes (no brand logo), gum sole, and visible pink lining/insole. Place the pair large in the foreground on a clean light-gray studio background with a soft vignette. Add three tiny generic outline icons (jeans, skirt, dress) arranged vertically on the right side, very subtle, to communicate versatility without adding products. Add a soft pink accent circle behind the heel area to echo the pink lining. Lighting: sharp, premium catalog, high micro-contrast on texture, natural shadow. Keep top-left clear for headline; bottom corners for badges. No people, no faces, no logos, no watermark.

style.badge: rounded sticker, solid color, high contrast
rounded sticker, slightly smaller than 'Envío gratis', high contrast

composition_rules.focus: Shoes dominate the frame (~75%); ensure cow print and pink lining are clearly visible; keep icons tiny and low-contrast so they never compete with the product.
composition_rules.text_legibility: Headline must sit on clean background area; use stroke/shadow to maintain readability; keep badges separated from product edges; all text within 10% safe margin and not overlapping busy textures.

prompts.negative_prompt: logos, brand marks, adidas, trefoil, watermark, QR code, copyrighted characters, recognizable faces, people, hands, busy lifestyle background, extra products, shoe box branding, wrong shoe model, high heels, boots, incorrect colors, missing cow print, missing pink lining, non-gum sole, low-res, blur, text glitches, misspellings
